word: H518 - אִם - ʼim - eem - But - ஆனால்

sections.paragraph: ஆல், இல்லையோ, போது, ஆனாலும், கண்டிப்பாக, சந்தேகமில்லாமல், மெய்யாகவே, ஒழி, தவிர, நிச்சயமாய், ஆகிலும் - எச்சம்
c) if.if, whether. or, whether.or. or

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive particle; used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogitive, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence as a negative, not: - (and, can-, doubtless, if, that) (not), + but, either, + except, + more (-over if, than), neither, nevertheless, nor, oh that, or, + save (only, -ing), seeing, since, sith, + surely (no more, none, not), though, + of a truth, + unless, + verily, when, whereas, whether, while, + yet.
Cognate: H3588, H3589, H3651, H509, H512, H514, H515, H518, H5921
